thread.section_title: Hotel Aida Opera - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Bad hotel - dated and dirty
thread.title_full: Bad hotel - dated and dirty - Review of Hotel Aida Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: U821SDrebeccaw
title: Bad hotel - dated and dirty
text: Not a nice experience - dated rooms, misleading photographs on hotel website. Pretty dirty and old fashioned. Only upside were the staff were helpful and pleasant. Location was pretty rubbish as not near a metro stop. In short, I wont be staying here again. Didn't eat at the hotel so couldnt comment on the food.
